titles.title: He the Pearly Gates Will Open

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Love Divine, so great and wondrous, Deep and mighty, pure, sublime! Coming from the heart of Jesus, Just the same thro' tests of time.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: He the pearly gates will open, So that I may enter in; For He purchased my redemption, And forgave me all my sin.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Like a dove when hunted, frightened, As a wounded fawn was I; Brokenhearted, yet He healed me, He will heed the sinner’s cry.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Love Divine, so great and wondrous, All my sins He then forgave! I will sing His praise forever, For His blood, His pow'r to save.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: In life’s eventide, at twilight, At His door I’ll knock and wait; By the precious love of Jesus I shall enter heaven’s gate.
